value:
That weapon of yours has such a
provocative shape. Does it feel
good to fire it? I bet it does.

I serve Lord Leo. He rescued me
from my former existence as a
filthy thief. I'd give my life for him.

If you run yourself ragged, you
should be sure to take a nap. I'd be
tickled to show you where.

How about a midnight stroll at some
point? I won't bite. I never do. At least,
not by the light of the moon.

That prince you serve is a pretty
bit of porcelain. But I think he'd
look nicer with a few chips.

You must be $Nu.$k$pSomeone must be awfully fond of you
to send me all this way. And that...
is $Nf!
My gain will be another's pain.

Oh! You've taken some liberties
with me. How nice.

I'm Niles from the Kingdom of Nohr.
Former outlaw. Current disgrace.
My arrows are yours.

Here you are. And here I am!
Aren't we a pair.$k$pI must confess that I've grown
after each of your visits—really
and truly, I have!$k$pI must also say that when I first
met you, Summoner, I thought you
were a fussy bit of butter.$k$pI served you, but not happily.
But now! Oh, what a difference!
I long to always be with you.$k$pI wonder, have you only indulged
your servant Niles? Or are we
becoming friends now?$k$pI know some see me as unsavory.
To them I say, variety is the spice
of life! But, what say you?$k$pEh? You trust me? How curious.
Someone dear to me once
said the very same thing.$k$pSo, you and I will be friends through
thick and thin. And, you know me...
I always delight my friends.
A little advice: wear white, and you invite mudslinging.
So, I came out of that weapon of yours. Scandalous.
Don't you just love to gaze at a full moon?
Where is Lord Leo? I'm sworn to protect him.
You and your prince are in quite a difficult position. I will be glad to assist.
